title: Application to existing relationships
context: [ยง526-16] Application to existing relationships. Except as otherwise provided in section 526-13, an interest in or power over property existing on July 1, 2000 as to which the time for delivering or filing a disclaimer under law superseded by this chapter has not expired may be disclaimed after July 1, 2000. [L 2000, c 43, pt of ยง1] Revision Note &ldquo;July 1, 2000&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;the effective date of this chapter&rdquo;.
